resources.string: Do you wish to be a PRESENTER or SPECTATOR?

"This app was created for an internship at the LMU during the summer semester 2018.

It was developed by: AAAAAA, BBBBBBB, CCCCCC and DDDDDD.

Icons have been obtained from: https://www.iconfinder.com/iconsets/education-flat-7 under the creative common license.
Noone wants to join your presentation yet :(

ViewPresent is an app developed for enabling easy and comfortable file transfer via Bluetooth within a range of approximate 100m. 

It does not need any internet connection and allows a fast file transfer between multiple nearby devices. 

There are two main role types in this application: “Presenters” and “Viewers”. 
Presenters are allowed to distribute files or data to all subscribed devices (viewers). 
They will automatically search for nearby devices (viewers) and can then select what devices he actually wishes or does not wish to include in the file sharing group. 
A viewer therefore is somebody who subscribed to a presenter, allowing him to receive everything the presenter distributes. 
Viewers can subscribe to multiple presenters, and presenters can have multiple viewers. 

If a viewer is allowed to receive data from one or multiple presenters, he can then also select all the devices he eventually wants to subscribe to. 

For for any concerns or feedback, please contact us under xxxxxx@campus.lmu.de
